result.execSummary:
The defendant Jermaine A McFarland was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Carry Concealed Weapon, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 941.23(2).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.descr: House of Correction - Imposed and Stayed
supervisions.notes: Concurrent with: With any other sentence. With credit for 2 days time served. If revoked court authorizes Huber for work.
*Court approves transfer of Probation to Fond Du Lac County.

miscConds.notes:
*Pay all mandatory costs and surcharges by March 23, 2017 failure to pay will result in a civil judgment.
*DNA sample to be taken and DNA surcharge to be paid by March 23, 2017.
*Court authorizes if defendant successfully completes probation and 1 year of NO new law violations arising to probable cause this case will be granted expungement.
*Successfully complete any other counseling and/or treatment deemed appropriate.
*Defendant to participate in Alcohol and Drug Assessment and successfully complete recommended treatment.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jermaine A McFarland

records.addlTxt: 3/29/16 bail refund notice mailed to surety.
Court authorizes if defendant successfully completes probation and 1 year of NO new law violations arising to probable cause this case will be granted expungement.

Sentencing proceeded.  Statements by the State, defense and defendant.  
Defendant sentenced to serve 60 days in the House of Correction, concurrent to any other sentence, with credit for 2 days time served.  COURT STAYED THE SENTENCE and placed the defendant on probation with the State of Wisconsin, Department of Corrections for a period of 6 months. Court approves transfer of Probation to Fond Du Lac County. If revoked court authorizes huber for work.
CONDITIONS OF PROBATION:
     *   Defendant to participate in Alcohol and Drug Assessment
          and successfully complete recommended treatment.
     *   Successfully complete any other counseling and/or
          treatment deemed appropriate.
     *   Pay all mandatory costs and surcharges by March 23, 2017 
          failure to pay will result in a civil judgement.
     *   DNA sample to be taken and DNA surcharge to be paid by
          March 23, 2017.
     *   No firearms.


Court authorizes if defendant successfully completes probation and 1 year of NO new law violations arising to probable cause this case will be granted expungement.

Appeal rights given.
Pretrial Incarceration Credit; received and filed
Notice of Right to Seek Post-Conviction Rights; received and filed
Letters on behalf of the defendant; received and filed.

Defendant Jermaine A McFarland in court with attorney Daniel Gordon Mitchell.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Defendant changes plea to GUILTY. Defendant examined as to his plea, advised of his Constitutional rights and the maximum penalty. Court found that defendant freely, voluntarily and intelligently waived his rights. Plea questionnaire received and filed. Parties stipulate to the complaint as a factual basis to sustain defendant's plea. Court found defendant guilty as charged in the criminal complaint and ordered a Judgment of Conviction be entered on the record.

Defendant Jermaine A McFarland in court with attorney Daniel Gordon Mitchell.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk:  vk   Final pretrial held.  Case adjourned to the jury trial date in Br. 31 on 3/23/2016 at 9:00 am.

Defendant Jermaine A McFarland in court with attorney Daniel Gordon Mitchell.  Kelly O'Neill appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Case in court for plea hearing. Defense requests final pre-trial and jury trial dates.  Final pre-trial scheduled for February 23, 2016 at 08:30 am.  Jury trial scheduled for March 23, 2016 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Jermaine A McFarland in court with attorney Daniel Gordon Mitchell.  Jennifer L Pickett appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Case in court for plea and sentencing. Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea in Branch 31.  Plea hearing scheduled for December 23, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Jermaine A McFarland in court in the p.m., attorney Daniel Gordon Mitchell appeared as scheduled in the a.m.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Case calendared for projected guilty pleas and sentencing. Defense counsel is unavailable for the p.m.  Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea and sentencing in Branch 31. All parties are notified that effective 12-01-15 this case will be assigned to Reserved Branch, Branch 31, in Room 615 of the Courthouse.
  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for December 9, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Jermaine A McFarland in court with attorney Daniel Gordon Mitchell.  Kelly O'Neill appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC.   Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea and sentencing in Branch 37.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for November 18, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Jermaine A McFarland in court, attorney Daniel Gordon Mitchell appeared prior to his client.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Case calendared for status of counsel.   Court ordered case adjourned for status conference in Branch 37.   Agreed Upon Request for a New Court Date is signed and filed.  Status conference scheduled for October 19, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Jermaine A McFarland in court.  Alex T. Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Case calendared for status of counsel. Defendant needs additional time to have public defender appointed.   Court ordered case adjourned for status of counsel in Branch 37.   Agreed Upon Request for a New Court Date is signed and filed. Status conference scheduled for September 24, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Jermaine A McFarland in court.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Case calendared for status of counsel. For reasons stated on the record as to defendant's financial status, Court referred defendant back to public defender's office.  Status conference scheduled for August 5, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Jermaine A McFarland in court.  Alex T. Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant requests time to be evaluated for public defender representation.   Court ordered case adjourned for status of counselconference in Branch 37. Defendant advised to report to the public defender's office immediately.  Status conference scheduled for July 2, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Actual Date Bond Posted with Sheriff:
04/22/15
Court ordered Defendant not to be in possession of any firearms or weapons.

Defendant Jermaine A McFarland in court.  Katherine Halopka-Ivery appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   
Defendant is advised that this case is assigned to Judge Dee, Branch 37. Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.   Defendant received a copy of the complaint and was advised of right to counsel.   Defendant does not qualify for Public Defender representation.  Court entered a plea of not guilty on behalf of the Defendant. Court reserves Defendant's right to file a substitution of judge pursuant to Sec. 971.20 until Defendant's next scheduled court appearance.  Case is adjourned for a Pretrial Conference in Branch 37.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for June 2, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant is Out-of-Custody. Court appearance in Out-Of-Custody Court, Room 221 Safety Building on 4-28-2015 at 1:30pm
